EmailTemplate.description: All The Key Ingredients To Keep Everything Clean
EmailTemplate.name: McDonalds
EmailTemplate.subject: All The Key Ingredients To Keep Everything Clean
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
OfficeDepot and McDonalds
The right cleaning tools at the right price. That’s our recipe for success. We know how important it is for you to make your restaurants healthy enviroments for employees and customers. Our extensive product selection offers just what you need to keep your space spotless … and help keep employee sick days to a minimum.
•
Microfiber cleaning cloths and dusters
•
Floor equipment including vacuums, floor scrubbers, mops and brooms
•
Trash bins, bags and liners
•
Floor mats and anti-fatigue floor coverings
•
Work gloves for safety and hygiene
Contact your dedicated Account Manager today:
Timothy Lebar 855.337.6811 Ext. 16524 timothy.lebar@officedepot.com
Gabriel Escobar 855.337.6811 Ext. 12692 gabriel.escobar@officedepot.com
